actions.name: Cosmic Luminance
actions.description:
Trigger: The user declares Sunsteel Strike.

Effect: The user freely Moves up to half their Overland Score as Teleport Movement before attacking.

actions.name: Cosmic Luminance
actions.description: Passive: The user is immune to negative [Stage Change] effects, and extends the duration of positive [Stage Change] effects by 2 Activations.

actions.name: Sunsteel Strike
actions.description: Effect: This attack is unaffected by the abilities of other creatures.
